role.admin.name: Administrator
role.admin.description: Most permissive role for overall system configuration and maintenance.
role.exec.name: Executive
role.exec.description: Authoritative role for application configuration and maintenance.
role.anon.name: Anonymous
role.anon.description: Least permissive role for accessing the application data without authentication.
role.base.name: Base
role.base.description: Basis for standard authenticated use of the application.
